FuncDef: This command configures the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use for an IP tunnel. This configuration applies to the outer IP header of the encapsulated packets. The IPv4 or IPv6 address must belong to the one of the IP subnets associated with the public SAP interface of the tunnel-group. Thesourceaddress,remote-ipaddress andbackup-remote-ipaddress of a tunnel must all belong to the same address family (IPv4 or IPv6). When the source address contains an IPv6 address it must be a global unicast address.

ParaDef.Info: An IPv4 address or an IPv6 address.
